title: Lecture Notes
content:
The calendar section shows when each of these topics was discussed in class.
NOTES TOPICS 1 Events and their probability (PDF) 2 Random variables: discrete distributions (PDF) 3 Random variables: continuous distributions (PDF) 4 Random vectors (PDF) 5 Functions of random variables and vectors (PDF) 6 Second-moment characterization of random variables and vectors; second-moment (SM) and first-order second-moment (FOSM) propagation of uncertainty (PDF) 7 Conditional second-moment analysis (PDF) 8 Selected distribution models (PDF) 9 Point and interval estimation of distribution parameters (PDF)
